Du Hoang

Unity XR

Unity is the most popular engine for creating XR experiences, commanding around 70-80% of the marketshare. I am the Senior Product Designer on the XR team that is in charge of all things workflow related.

Because Unity XR is very feature-rich, I have designed everything from setting up XR projects, to importing and managing content, selecting and controlling simulations, body tracking, capture 3D objects from photos, configure composition layers, and many more.
